content.query:
SELECT *
FROM (
    SELECT *
    FROM OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://kraftsynapse.dfs.core.windows.net/incidentcontainer/tickets.csv',
        FORMAT='CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION='2.0',
        HEADER_ROW=TRUE
    ) WITH (
        TicketID NVARCHAR(50),
        DateCreated NVARCHAR(50),
        Category NVARCHAR(255),
        Priority NVARCHAR(50),
        AssignedTeam NVARCHAR(50),
        Status NVARCHAR(50),
        Description NVARCHAR(1000),
        RootCause NVARCHAR(255)
    ) AS raw
) AS cleaned



SELECT
    TRY_CAST(DateCreated AS DATETIME) AS CleanDateCreated
FROM your_cleaned_table_or_subquery;
